short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension that can hide all the spoilers in a website for your upcoming movie/TV-series in your watch-list!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Type in all keywords of your favourite movie/tv-series and this extension will hide all spoilers related to it in all websites that you browse.
